Node.Text: No I didn't. I never met either one of them. All I know is, with how things are going, the battle is still far from over.
Why are you so quick to mourn? We lost a man yesterday. It's just like on the battlefield, we were all just numbers, numbers and guns. And now all I am is a suspect, and he was just a victim.
Either way, it doesn't matter. He's gone. Leave the dead their peace, and leave me the rest of my day.
Node.Hint: Something really struck a nerve with him.

Node.Text: I'm fine. I thought you should know that I saw Alex with a weird vial of something earlier today. Don't know what it was, but I don't trust it.
